mods.abstract: Contact sheet consists of 36 negatives, including: #27-28, a meeting featuring signs for ‘Ianno’ on the stage; #29-31, people at a meeting; six unnumbered, people at a dinner event (Domingos Marques and Bill Moniz?); #5-9, 42, 1-4A, 10-14A, community meeting at the Toronto Hilton Harbour Castle featuring men speaking at a podium with Bill Moniz (Martin Silva featured?); #3-4, man being interviewed; #5-8, an art show with pictures featuring an individual man; #34, a display for ’25 Years in Canada, Our History’ (Domingos Marques on left with cigarette and John Medeiros on right?); #35-36, community function at Toronto Hilton Harbour Castle, (#35, John Medeiros in center?).
mods.note: 1 negative (#34) scanned out ouf 36 in assignment.
mods.accessCondition: For further copyright information contact : ascproj@yorku.ca
